p: The catalysts’ tolerance towards CO poisoning was also investigated using CO stripping voltammetry. CVs were recorded in N 2 and CO saturated 1M NaOH electrolyte, respectively ( Figure S6). In the case of nitrogen doped graphene, no significant modification of the CVs’ profile was observed, while, for the Pt/C, two oxidation peaks appeared at −0.4 and −0.31 V vs. Ag/AgCl, showing a poisoning effect.
